source/utils/numberWithCommas.js

numberWithCommas

a utility function to return a number with commas every three digits credit to Elias Zamaria http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2901102/how-to-print-a-number-with-commas-as-thousands-separators-in-javascript

Barista.numberWithCommas = function(x){ return x.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ","); };
